department: Secreteriat du Conseil du Trésor du Canada (Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat)
short_summary: We are looking for 13-inch MacBook Pro or equivalent PCs
full_summary:
# 13-inch MacBook Pro or Equivalent for Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat

**Government Tender Announcement**

## Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number:** 2BH2132223/A
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Description of Requirement

The Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat requires 25 firm deliverables and 25 client options of 13-inch MacBook Pro or equivalent units, as outlined in the Statement of Requirement and the List of Deliverables in the Request for Quotation.

## Delivery Details

* **Delivery Destination:** Ottawa, Ontario
* **Delivery Date:** Within 60 federal government working days from contract award
* **Security Requirements:** Non-applicable
* **Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements:** Non-applicable

## Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Tara Halajko
* **Contact Email:** [tara.halajko@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:tara.halajko@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* **Contact Telephone:** 343-999-5042
* **Address:** 400 Cooper Street, 6th Floor, Ottawa, ON K2P 2N1

## Bid Submission

To access the solicitation and submit your bid, please click on the following link: <https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login> Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Amendments

There are no amendments to this solicitation.

## Closing Date and Time

The solicitation closes on January 20, 2023 at 14:00:00. Note: The closing date for this solicitation has passed.

## Registration

To participate in this solicitation, you must register on the SSC Supplier Portal at <https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login>.REGISTRATION IS NOW CLOSED yPosdddd

Please correct any errors I found and keep your response to 400 words.
